Several of their alien friends have come back with them to recover members of their own race left behind in cocoons on the ocean floor, one of whom has been abducted by a government research institute. Sci-fi sequel, with Wilford Brimley, Don Ameche, Steve Guttenberg and Jessica Tandy.(n)

programme.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the near future, humanoid apes are used as slave labour by brutal humans. An intelligent chimpanzee, the son of two apes from a further distance in time, conceals his ability to speak and lives under the protection of a kindly circus master. But when he is exposed, he leads his fellow simians in a violent uprising. Sci-fi drama, presenting an origin story for the original movie, starring Roddy McDowall and Ricardo Montalban.(n)

programme.title: Armageddon
programme.desc: Nasa discovers an asteroid the size of Texas is on a collision course with Earth, so a drilling expert is recruited to train a team of misfits to transport a nuclear device into outer space to destroy it - but having had no experience of space travel, the reluctant astronauts find themselves seriously out of their depth. Sci-fi thriller, with Bruce Willis, Ben Affleck, Liv Tyler, Michael Clarke Duncan, Billy Bob Thornton and Steve Buscemi.(n)

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: A computer programmer working for the world's biggest search engine is given the opportunity to spend a week at the remote home of his boss, a hi-tech genius. The break turns out to be an elaborate experiment, in which he must test the world's first truly artificial intelligence, which is housed in the body of a beautiful robot girl. Sci-fi drama, starring Domhnall Gleeson, Alicia Vikander and Oscar Isaac.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix
programme.desc: A computer hacker discovers the world around him is nothing more than a virtual-reality fantasy created by malevolent living machines. Entering the devastated real world, he joins freedom fighters risking their lives to bring the truth out into the open and liberate the human race. Sci-fi action thriller, starring Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss and Hugo Weaving.(n)

programme.title: The Gallows
programme.desc: A high-school play ends in tragedy when a boy is accidentally killed during a performance. The school puts on another production of the same show 20 years later which a gang of camcorder-wielding students intend to sabotage - but nobody is prepared for the ghost of the dead boy returning to terrorise the performance. Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2016
programme.desc: Countdown of the biggest box office hits in Britain and America.(n)

programme.title: Conquest of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the near future, humanoid apes are used as slave labour by brutal humans. An intelligent chimpanzee, the son of two apes from a further distance in time, conceals his ability to speak and lives under the protection of a kindly circus master. But when he is exposed, he leads his fellow simians in a violent uprising. Sci-fi drama, presenting an origin story for the original movie, starring Roddy McDowall and Ricardo Montalban.(n)

Found-footage horror, starring Reese Mishler and Pfeifer Brown.(n)

programme.title: Tangerines
programme.desc: In the Apkhazeti region of Georgia in 1990, an Estonian man has stayed behind to harvest his crops of tangerines, but when a wounded man is left behind, he is forced to take him in. Drama, starring Lembit Ulfsak, Giorgi Nakashidze and Elmo Nuganen. In Estonian, Russian and Georgian.

programme.title: The Necessary Death of Charlie Countryman
programme.desc: A troubled American travels to Romania in the aftermath of his mother's death. He becomes obsessed with a cellist he meets who is concealing a violent past. His efforts to romance her could cost him his life following a run-in with her brutally violent husband. Drama, starring Shia LaBeouf, Evan Rachel Wood and Mads Mikkelsen.

programme.title: Midnight Cowboy
programme.desc: A friendship develops between a down-at-heel streetwise New York eccentric and a naive Texas country boy who aspires to be a well-paid gigolo. Oscar-winning drama, starring Dustin Hoffman, Jon Voight, Brenda Vaccaro and Sylvia Miles.

programme.title: Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus
programme.desc: Fictionalised biopic imagining the events that inspired the photographer's unusual art. Bored with her marriage and work as her husband's assistant on fashion shoots, she becomes fascinated with her mysterious neighbour, a former sideshow performer who has excessive body hair. Starring Nicole Kidman, Robert Downey Jr and Ty Burrell.

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.

programme.title: Rebel Without a Cause
programme.desc: An angry teenage social outcast rejects any form of authority in his search for a sense of identity. Eventually, he finds solace in the company of two like-minded and equally alienated misfits. However, a spate of violent confrontations forces them to go on the run, and their plan to stay in hiding has tragic consequences. Drama, starring James Dean, Natalie Wood, Sal Mineo and Jim Backus.

programme.title: The New World
programme.desc: A 17th-century English settler in America falls in love with a native princess, but as conflict erupts between their people he is forced to abandon her. She is converted to Christianity, adopting European culture and forming a romance with a tobacco planter, but remains torn between two worlds. Terrence Malick's epic historical drama, starring Colin Farrell, Q'orianka Kilcher, Christian Bale and Christopher Plummer.

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling.

programme.title: Frost/Nixon
programme.desc: British broadcaster and journalist David Frost comes up with the idea of setting up a series of exclusive televised interviews with the disgraced former president of the United States, Richard Nixon. Believing he could use the publicity as a chance to resurrect his political career and make some easy money, Nixon agrees but soon realises he has underestimated Frost. Fact-based drama, starring Frank Langella, Michael Sheen, Sam Rockwell and Kevin Bacon.

programme.title: The Commitments
programme.desc: A would-be music producer from Dublin believes he can make it big in Ireland by promoting a top-rate soul band, so he trawls a working-class neighbourhood and auditions unlikely singers and musicians to put together as a group. Alan Parker's urban comedy, based on the novel by Roddy Doyle, starring Robert Arkins, Andrew Strong, Michael Aherne, Angeline Ball and Maria Doyle Kennedy.

programme.title: Straight Outta Compton
programme.desc: Biopic of hip hop group NWA, examining their rise to fame in the 1980s. The five members of the group drew inspiration from their anger at the dangerous world they saw around them, producing hard-hitting songs about urban life that redefined a musical genre. Starring O'Shea Jackson Jr, Corey Hawkins, Jason Mitchell, Neil Brown Jr and Aldis Hodge.

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: A troubled philosophy professor begins teaching at a small town college, but struggles to find any meaning in his life. He finds some measure of happiness in his friendship with a student, and when they overhear a stranger's conversation, it spurs the tortured academic on to a course of action that changes everything. Woody Allen's drama, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Emma Stone and Parker Posey.

programme.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
programme.desc: A rebellious convict gets himself sent to a psychiatric hospital, thinking it will be easier than prison. Finding himself surrounded by institutionalised patients, he encourages them to rebel against the tyrannical head nurse. Milos Forman's Oscar-winning drama based on Ken Kesey's novel, starring Jack Nicholson, Louise Fletcher, Brad Dourif and Danny DeVito.(n)

programme.title: American Gigolo
programme.desc: A male escort is falsely accused of murdering a wealthy woman, and his only hope of proving his innocence rests with a client reluctant to come forward and provide him with an alibi. Thriller, written and directed by Paul Schrader, starring Richard Gere, Lauren Hutton and Hector Elizondo.(n)

programme.title: Ace in the Hole
programme.desc: An abrasive, hard-drinking reporter is reduced to working for a small-town newspaper, where he discovers a man trapped in a mine shaft. He sees a chance to revive his career, and manipulates the rescue operation to drag things out as long as possible, creating a media circus but putting the man's life in jeopardy. Billy Wilder's drama, starring Kirk Douglas and Jan Sterling.(n)

programme.title: Inherent Vice
programme.desc: A drug addled private detective unwittingly becomes embroiled in an elaborate kidnapping case in Los Angeles during the 1970s involving an old flame, her billionaire boyfriend and his wife. Comedy drama based on Thomas Pynchon's acclaimed novel, starring Joaquin Phoenix, Josh Brolin and Reese Witherspoon.(n)

programme.title: Magic in the Moonlight
programme.desc: An English magician who exposes fake psychics is approached by his friend to prove that a medium is a fraud exploiting a wealthy family. As he watches the spiritualist at work, he begins to believe that she is the genuine article, challenging his previously unshakeable scepticism. Woody Allen's 1920s-set romantic comedy, with Colin Firth and Emma Stone.(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: A Fistful of Dollars
programme.desc: A mysterious gunslinger rides into a town on the Mexican border divided by two warring families. After killing the henchmen of one clan, he seems to have made it clear where his loyalties lie and is hired by their rivals. However, he is secretly planning to play them off against each other to his own advantage. Sergio Leone's Western, with Clint Eastwood making his first appearance as The Man with No Name alongside Gian Maria Volonte and Marianne Koch.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: A wage-slave in his uncle's factory has big ambitions. Just as he comes close to marrying a wealthy socialite, a poor working-class girl with whom he had a brief, casual affair tells him she is pregnant with his child. When she threatens to disclose the truth, he makes a series of decisions which bring terrible consequences in their wake. Oscar-winning drama, starring Montgomery Clift, Shelley Winters, Elizabeth Taylor,and Raymond Burr.(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A US congressman gets embroiled in a secret mission to provide covert military support to rebels in Soviet-occupied Afghanistan. Before long, he finds unlikely allies in the shape of a womanising CIA agent, a Texan socialite and the president of Pakistan. Fact-based political drama set during the 1980s, starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman.(n)

programme.title: Mistress America
programme.desc: A lonely student finds her first year at university in New York a disappointing experience, with uninspiring studies and no social life. Everything changes when her mother remarries and she acquires a new stepsister, whose bizarre schemes draw her into the kind of lifestyle she had always dreamed of - and provide fresh creative inspiration. Comedy, starring Lola Kirke and Greta Gerwig.(n)

programme.title: RocknRolla
programme.desc: A Russian mob boss sets up a profitable real-estate scam in London and soon every criminal in the city is after their share. The gangster's accountant hires a trio of crooks to take his boss's millions, while a rock star with a penchant for faking his own death causes further mayhem by stealing a valuable painting. Guy Ritchie's crime comedy, starring Gerard Butler, Tom Wilkinson and Thandie Newton.(n)

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: A Philadelphia cop is assigned to protect an Amish boy who was the only witness to a murder. Discovering the killers are rogue policemen willing to go to any lengths to cover up their crime, he is forced to go into hiding within the Amish community, experiencing a clash of cultures and unexpected feelings for the boy's widowed mother. Thriller, directed by Peter Weir, with Harrison Ford, Kelly McGillis, Lukas Haas and Danny Glover.(n)

programme.title: Red Sorghum
programme.desc: A woman in 1930s China is forced into an arranged marriage to the owner of a winery by her father. When her husband dies, she devotes herself to making a success of his business and begins a relationship with the foreman - but her new life is threatened by the outbreak of war with Japan. Yimou Zhang's period drama, starring Gong Li and Wen Jiang. In Mandarin and Japanese.

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: A casino magnate approaches a group of no-hopers with the offer of $2million to whoever retrieves the sum from a locker in a train station in New Mexico, prompting a madcap cross-continent dash. Meanwhile, the casino owner's high-rolling gambler friends place bets on which of the bumbling contestants will win. Comedy, with Rowan Atkinson, John Cleese, Whoopi Goldberg, Kathy Bates, Seth Green and Cuba Gooding Jr.

programme.title: Swiss Family Robinson
programme.desc: An 18th-century family becomes shipwrecked on an island off the coast of Papua New Guinea. The father and his eldest son begin building a new home, but find their efforts jeopardised by the unwanted attention of nearby pirates. Disney adventure based on the novel by Johann David Wyss, starring John Mills, Dorothy McGuire, James MacArthur, Tommy Kirk and Janet Munro.

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to the magical world accompanied by their selfish cousin. They join their old friend King Caspian as he sets sail across the sea in search of seven of his father's allies who had been banished years before, but along the way they discover an evil force is growing in strength. Fantasy adventure, with Georgie Henley, Skandar Keynes, Will Poulter and Ben Barnes.

programme.title: The Core
programme.desc: A chain of bizarre and deadly incidents in several countries leads scientists to the conclusion that the Earth's core has stopped spinning. As chaos erupts around the world, experts hatch a plan to halt the destruction and save the human race - but it involves venturing deep below the planet's surface to detonate a nuclear bomb. Sci-fi thriller, starring Aaron Eckhart, Hilary Swank, Stanley Tucci and DJ Qualls.

programme.title: Knight and Day
programme.desc: A woman has a chance encounter with a rogue secret agent, who has been framed as a traitor and is on the run from his own superiors. Realising she is in danger for knowing too much, he kidnaps her and drags her along on his desperate mission to clear his name. Comedy adventure, with Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz.

programme.title: Conan the Barbarian
programme.desc: A child who grows up in slavery becomes a formidable warrior and a cunning thief. Taken prisoner by a victorious king, he is sent out to destroy the leader of the barbaric cult that destroyed his village and slaughtered his family. Fantasy adventure, based on the stories by author Robert E Howard, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Max von Sydow, James Earl Jones and Sandahl Bergman.

programme.title: Splice
programme.desc: Two scientists hope to create new creatures for medical purposes by combining DNA from various animals. When their funding is stopped, they secretly create a new creature incorporating human DNA. However, they soon realise they cannot control it, while the relationship between the being and its creators turns dangerous. Sci-fi horror, starring Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley and Delphine Chaneac.(n)

programme.title: Magic in the Water
programme.desc: Two children investigate the legend of a mythical creature rumoured to live in the lake by their holiday home. They are astonished when they discover the monster and find it is actually quite friendly - and is eager to help the children thwart a company dumping toxic waste in the water. Family adventure, starring Mark Harmon, Joshua Jackson and Harley Jane Kozak.(n)

programme.title: Voyage to the Bottom of the Sea
programme.desc: An admiral takes charge of an experimental submarine just as the world is plunged into catastrophe. A belt of radiation surrounding the planet has ignited, threatening all life on Earth. The admiral believes he can end the crisis with a well-aimed nuclear missile, but faces an uphill struggle to convince high command that his plan will not lead to more destruction. Sci-fi adventure, with Walter Pidgeon, Joan Fontaine and Robert Sterling.(n)

programme.title: Diary of a Wimpy Kid: Dog Days
programme.desc: Weedy youngster Greg finds his plans for a lazy school holiday ruined when his mother bans video games and his father organises a series of family activities. When he finds out a girl he likes is working at a country club, he tells his family he has a summer job there as an excuse to spend time with her - but struggles to keep up the deception. Family comedy sequel, starring Zachary Gordon and Steve Zahn.(n)

programme.title: Cheaper By the Dozen
programme.desc: A large family moves to a new town, hoping for a fresh start - but nothing goes according to plan, and the unlucky dad ends up in charge of his 12 rowdy children while his wife goes on a promotional book tour. Remake of the 1950 comedy, starring Steve Martin, Bonnie Hunt, Piper Perabo, Tom Welling and Hilary Duff.(n)

programme.title: The Tourist
programme.desc: A fugitive's girlfriend is being watched by the police while travelling from Paris to Venice. She seduces an unsuspecting American tourist to make them think he is her lover with his appearance altered by plastic surgery, leaving the baffled holidaymaker pursued across Europe by the cops and rival gangsters. Romantic thriller, with Johnny Depp, Angelina Jolie and Paul Bettany.(n)

programme.title: Paul
programme.desc: An alien held captive in a top-secret American military base escapes and hides out in the van of two English comic-book geeks on a tour of UFO hotspots. The wisecracking extraterrestrial enlists the duo's help in getting back to his spaceship, but they are soon pursued by government agents and unwittingly become kidnappers. Sci-fi comedy, starring Simon Pegg and Nick Frost, with the voice of Seth Rogen.(n)

programme.title: The Running Man
programme.desc: A helicopter pilot is framed for the murder of starving civilians - and ends up being forced to take part in a brutal TV game show in which a succession of gadget-wielding killers hunt him on the streets of Los Angeles. Sci-fi action adventure, starring Arnold Schwarzenegger, Yaphet Kotto, Maria Conchita Alonso and Richard Dawson.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family offers the new minister a place to stay, and Elizabeth falls in love with him. Erin offers to help the Baldwin sisters write their memoirs.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Jason wrestles with the morality of war as he decides whether to enlist in the army, while Jim Bob is desperate to join up despite being too young.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: A talented player leaves the townsfolk convinced they will win an annual baseball game, but when they start betting on the event, his disapproving wife forbids him from taking part.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: The children compete in a leaf-collecting contest, but Mrs Oleson does not want her kids to be outshone.

programme.title: Kidnapped: The Elizabeth Smart Story
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the abduction of a teenager from her home in Salt Lake City in 2002. The search for the girl turned into a nationwide media frenzy, but nine months later as hope was fading, she was found alive and well in the company of an unbalanced couple. Starring Amber Marshall, Dylan Baker and Lindsay Frost.

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.

programme.title: The Disappearing Act
programme.desc: A distraught mother turns detective to find out the truth behind her son's disappearance, concerned he may have met with foul play at the hands of his beautiful but volatile girlfriend. Fact-based drama, starring Patty Duke, Kelly Rowan and Robert Floyd.

programme.title: Undercover Christmas
programme.desc: An FBI agent reluctantly agrees to keep a close eye on a waitress who put herself in the firing line when she spoke up about her boyfriend's criminal activities. However, the witness protection job takes a turn for the unexpected when the lawman has to return to his hometown for Christmas - dragging the damsel in distress with him. Romantic comedy, starring Jami Gertz, Shawn Christian and Tyne Daly.

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.

programme.title: The Night They Saved Christmas
programme.desc: Santa's North Pole home is threatened when an oil company plans to drill in the vicinity, but the wife and son of a company employee are enlisted to help save the toy-making village from destruction. Festive fantasy, starring Art Carney, Jaclyn Smith, Paul Le Mat and Mason Adams.

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.

programme.title: Sudden Fury
programme.desc: Three abused brothers are suspected of complicity in the murder of their callous adoptive parents. Fact-based drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Johnny Galecki, Gregory Harrison and Linda Kelsey.

programme.title: The Glass House
programme.desc: A former college professor launches a campaign for prison reforms while serving time in a harsh maximum security jail for manslaughter. Drama based on a short story by Truman Capote, starring Alan Alda, Vic Morrow, Dean Jagger and Billy Dee Williams.

programme.title: Ambush in Waco
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about the life of American religious leader David Koresh, whose belief in his own divinity eventually led to a violent and tragic confrontation with the authorities. Starring Timothy Daly and Dan Lauria.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Ben hatches a money-making scheme his father does not approve of, while Yancy trains to become a barber.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The family takes in an old friend of John Boy's who has been serving in the war, but is now in a wheelchair as a result of his injuries.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Laura and Grace are frustrated that the boys they want to take them to the spring dance are showing no interest, so decide to make them jealous.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. A widow realises she does not have long to live, so asks Charles to find homes for her three children.(n)

programme.title: The Road from Coorain
programme.desc: Biopic of Australian feminist writer Jill Ker Conway, charting her upbringing in a farming community and early experience of the academic world. Starring Juliet Stevenson and Richard Roxburgh.(n)

programme.title: Sleeping Dogs Lie
programme.desc: Popular and successful theatre impresario Ambrose Small unexpectedly sells his empire and disappears without a trace, leaving his friends and family baffled. Mystery, set in 1919, starring Wendy Crewson and Art Hindle.(n)

programme.title: Wicked Love
programme.desc: Fact-based drama about a woman found in a car boot after an attempt on her life that leaves her in a coma. As her unfaithful husband and his mistress stand trial, a controversy erupts over whether her life support should be switched off. Starring Rebecca Gibney, Vince Colosimo and Maya Stange.(n)

programme.title: DC 9/11: Time of Crisis
programme.desc: Fact-based drama chronicling the aftermath of the September 11 attacks, as people across America attempted to come to terms with the tragedy, focusing on the reaction of President George W Bush and the advice given by his many advisors. Timothy Bottoms, John Cunningham, Andrew Gillies, Penny Johnson and Doug Lennox star.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Reunion
programme.desc: An orphan yearns to be closer to his ageing grandfather, and his wish is granted after a visit to Santa Claus reveals a few home truths. Drama, with Edward Woodward, James Coburn and Meredith Edwards.(n)

programme.title: Miracle of the Heart
programme.desc: After losing a patient in surgery, doctor Nathan Andrews takes a break from his career and returns to his small town roots. A chance encounter with an old acquaintance offers him a promise for the future, only for a tragedy to call into question everything he believes. Drama, starring Neil Patrick Harris, Rebecca Gayheart and Rob Lowe.(n)

programme.title: On the Second Day of Christmas
programme.desc: A woman and her niece are caught stealing just before Christmas, and face the prospect of spending the festive season in the care of social services - until a kindly shop worker volunteers to put them up. Romantic drama, starring Mary Stuart Masterson and Mark Ruffalo.(n)

programme.title: With Savage Intent
programme.desc: An estate agent sets out to track down the mystery assailants who shot and left her for dead at an empty property - only to realise they are men of influence whose prestige will make them hard to convict. Thriller, starring Elizabeth Montgomery, Robert Foxworth, Howard Rollins and Ronny Cox.(n)

programme.title: Deacons for Defence
programme.desc: A black man is pushed too far by the racist abuse and unprovoked violent assaults meted out by white bigots in the 1960s, and organises a defence group to fight back. Fact-based drama, starring Forest Whitaker, Adam Weiner, Jonathan Silverman and Serene Lee.(n)

programme.title: Murder in a College Town
programme.desc: Mother-of-two Rose Earl proudly sends her eldest son off to college, only for him to be led into a life of crime by his dastardly roommate. When he subsequently disappears without trace, Rose embarks on a desperate search to discover what has become of him. Drama, starring Kate Jackson, Drew Ebersole and Matthew Settle.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part one of the two-part pilot of the drama series about an angel sent to Earth to help people improve their lives, beginning with the residents of a retirement home.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Part two of two. Jonathan needs to take Mark into his confidence and reveal he is an angel in order to complete his first assignment.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: Matt is captured by bank robbers and held for ransom.

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.desc: A wanted murderer blames Matt for the death of his son, and gets his chance for revenge when the lawman strays into his territory.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica befriends a boy whose mother and sister were killed in an accident, but later learns one of them is still alive.

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.sub-title: Show Me the Way to Go Home.
programme.desc: Monica fills in at a school as both history teacher and assistant basketball coach. Monica manages to help a student in the team with his game as well as the stubborn coach.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: A jealous John-Boy runs into possible competition for the attention of his favourite schoolteacher.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Mary Ellen falls for a college student, while Grandma starts to feel the effects of old age as she reaches her 68th birthday.

programme.title: Untamed Love
programme.desc: A teacher who specialises in tutoring children with learning difficulties forms a close bond with a violent girl traumatised by years of physical and psychological abuse. Fact-based drama, starring Cathy Lee Crosby, Ashlee Lauren, John Getz and Richard Fancy.

programme.title: Family Rescue
programme.desc: A teenager is raped and becomes pregnant by her mother's boyfriend - but to her horror, the court grants him custody of the child. Drama, starring George C Scott, Rachael Leigh Cook, Dom Diamont and Ally Sheedy.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A father whose daughter is seriously ill fears she will not live through the year. He is determined to make sure her remaining time is happy, and with the help of his neighbours, he arranges to celebrate Halloween and Christmas months ahead of schedule so she can enjoy both holidays. Drama, starring John Corbett and Sam Elliott.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part one of two. The family mourns Grandpa's death and celebrates his life, while Mary Ellen and Erin become roommates in Charlottesville.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Jenny is paralysed in an accident, but hope arrives in the form of an elderly doctor who takes her as his last patient. Ralph Bellamy guest stars.

programme.title: Who Will Love My Children
programme.desc: A woman is diagnosed with terminal cancer shortly after the birth of her 10th child, and realising she has far too many children for her husband to look after on his own, decides to spend her remaining years finding suitable families to adopt them. Fact-based drama, starring Ann-Margret, Frederic Forrest, Cathryn Damon and Donald Moffat.

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Biopic of the African leader, following his rise to power in the 19th century as he united several tribes into a single state. Starring Henry Cele.

programme.title: Against Her Will: The Carrie Buck Story
programme.desc: A woman with learning disabilities is declared unfit to raise her newborn daughter, but goes to court to fight for custody of the child. Drama, starring Marlee Matlin, Melissa Gilbert and Pat Hingle.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Jonathan comes to the aid of a widow whose son is dying and a young runaway, while Mark helps a thief who has been abandoned by his family.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Masked Rider.
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark persuade an ageing movie star to be a real-life hero by standing up to a street gang, and also help a boxer who is being pressured into throwing a fight.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part One.
programme.desc: Part one of two. Confederate Civil War veterans become bank robbers, disguising themselves as Union soldiers to discredit their old enemies.(n)

programme.title: Gunsmoke
programme.sub-title: The Guns of Cibola Blanca - Part Two.
programme.desc: Part two of two. A search is organised for Doc when his stagecoach arrives without its passengers.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica is faced with the challenge of helping a well-known journalist with a drink problem. Drama, starring Roma Downey and Della Reese.(n)

programme.title: Touched by an Angel
programme.desc: Monica meets an enthusiastic boater with a shady past, but the encounter puts her fear of water to the test.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Olivia embarks on a one-woman strike, prompting John to take her on a belated honeymoon after 19 years of marriage.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Charlie Harmon throws John a financial lifeline by offering him £5,000 for Walton's Mountain, but the deal comes with strings attached. Noah Beery guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Sharing the Secret
programme.desc: A teenager struggles with bulimia, while her psychologist mother deals with her guilt at not recognising the signs of an eating disorder. Drama, starring Alison Lohman, Mare Winningham and Roxana Brusso.(n)

programme.title: A Killing in a Small Town
programme.desc: A Sunday school teacher looking for excitement embarks on an affair with a church-going man, leading to a fatal confrontation with his wife - but as the case goes to trial, she realises the odds are stacked against a jury accepting her plea of self-defence. Fact-based drama, starring Barbara Hershey, Brian Dennehy, John Terry and Lee Garlington.(n)

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: A mix-up in a maternity ward results in two new mothers unwittingly taking home the wrong babies - leaving them to face a terrible dilemma once the truth comes to light. Drama based on a true story, starring Melissa Gilbert, Rosanna Arquette, David Andrews and James McCaffrey.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Part two of two. The family mourns Grandpa's death and celebrates his life, while Mary Ellen and Erin become roommates in Charlottesville.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Sarah Carter's father causes problems when he arrives in Walnut Grove and tries to persuade his family to give up the simple life and enjoy a luxurious existence in New York.(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girl Murders
programme.desc: A detective is sent to investigate when the stars of a new raunchy calendar are murdered one at a time. He faces a race against time to find the killer before more blood is shed. Thriller, starring Tom Skerritt and Sharon Stone.(n)

programme.title: Escape from Terror: The Teresa Stamper Story
programme.desc: A woman falls in love with the man she believes is Mr Right and hastily marries him, but it isn't long before he begins showing his true colours, forcing her to seek shelter at a safe house. Fact-based drama, starring Maria Pitillo, Adam Storke and Brad Dourif.(n)

programme.title: Shaka Zulu
programme.desc: Concluding instalment of the drama based on the rise of the gifted Zulu leader during the turbulent 19th century. Driven by an ancient tribal prophecy, Shaka united several tribes into a bold new nation. Starring Henry Cele. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: Murder of Innocence
programme.desc: A woman's descent into insanity is witnessed by her confused and alienated husband as he battles the authorities to prove she is a danger to society. Drama, starring Valerie Bertinelli and Stephen Caffrey.(n)

programme.title: The Circus: Inside The Greatest Political Show on Earth
programme.desc: In the Arena. The Democrats make Hillary Clinton a historic nominee; Bernie Sanders diehards jeer and boo in Philadelphia. Also: a look at whether shattering the glass ceiling is enough for Clinton and Kaine to unite their party into a winning coalition

programme.title: Good Luck Chuck
programme.desc: An accursed dentist is in demand because whoever he sleeps with finds true love in her next boyfriend

programme.title: Zodiac
programme.desc: Set in the Bay Area in the 1960s and '70s, ZODIAC sees a murderer with seemingly random targets sending terrifying threats and cryptic codes to police and publishers all around San Francisco, leading fear and paranoia descend on the city

programme.title: The Railway Man
programme.desc: Forty years on from a tortuous existence as a prisoner of war in Japan, a former WWII soldier struggles to bury the past

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: Disgraced record exec Mark Ruffalo attempts to kick-start the career of heartbroken songwriter Keira Knightley in this poignant musical comedy from the director of Once

programme.title: Hot Rod
programme.desc: Wannabe stuntman Rod sets up a lethal motorbike jump to raise money for his stepdad's heart operation. Nerdy slapstick comedy

programme.title: Compared to What? The Improbable Journey of Barney Frank
programme.desc: Profiling Democratic congressman Barney Frank during his final year in office, as he reflects on his journey as a pioneering, openly gay politician

programme.title: All Things Must Pass: The Rise and Fall of Tower Records
programme.desc: A retail powerhouse since 1960, Tower Records was the heart and soul of the music world until the company filed for bankruptcy in 2006. It is widely believed that the death knell of the once billion dollar behemoth is attributed to the meteoric rise of the internet but director Colin Hanks examines the other explosive factors responsible for the tragic demise of this iconic record store chain

programme.title: Begin Again
programme.desc: Disgraced record exec Mark Ruffalo attempts to kick-start the career of heartbroken songwriter Keira Knightley in this poignant musical comedy from the director of Once

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: Three female college students break into a mansion they thought was unoccupied, and mistakenly kill the groundskeeper. Their friendship begins to implode as they try to decide what to do with the body

programme.title: Killing Season
programme.desc: After the duo strike up an unlikely friendship that goes sour, a former Serbian soldier hunts an American military veteran in the remote Appalachian mountains in this masterfully tense tale of survival

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: Craig Brewer's two-handed drama begins after Rae's soldier husband is called up for duty in Iraq. She goes off the rails, sleeping around, until one encounter leaves her semi-naked in the road, where she's found by Lazarus, who's nursing his own hurt of a cheating wife. Determined to save Rae from herself, he initially imprisons her in his home, but, as they form a relationship, so she begins to understand the reasons behind her actions

programme.title: Ray Donovan
programme.desc: Fish and Bird. Ray waits to see if Belikov will be released from prison and struggles with the prospect of putting a pimp back out on the street. Later, Art dealer Sonia Kovitsky invites Ray to a breast cancer benefit where he encounters some former clients and becomes more entrenched in her operation. Meanwhile, Teresa spirals into a postpartum depression; and Mickey tries to persuade the DA that he was the sole architect behind the Minassian massacre

programme.title: 60 Minutes Sports
programme.desc: Segments include a look at the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships; a re-visit to "Friday Night Lights" in Odessa, Texas; and a report on one of the most lucrative deep-sea fishing tournaments in the world

programme.title: Roadies
programme.desc: Longest Days. Janine shakes things up with the band and crew; Wes treats Winston to a guitar lesson from a rock legend

programme.desc: Segments include a look at the U.S. Naval Academy's Brigade Boxing Championships; a re-visit to "Friday Night Lights" in Odessa, Texas; and a report on one of the most lucrative deep-sea fishing tournaments in the world

programme.title: The Best Man
programme.desc: A guy tries to help his best friend win the attention of the girl of his dreams(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: Craig Brewer's two-handed drama begins after Rae's soldier husband is called up for duty in Iraq. She goes off the rails, sleeping around until one encounter leaves her semi-naked in the road, where she's found by Lazarus, who's nursing his own hurt of a cheating wife. programme.title: Off-Air
programme.desc: Off-Air(n)

programme.title: Miles to Go Before I Sleep
programme.desc: The relationships between musicians and their road crews, and their importance, are explored(n)

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: Curtis Hanson ( LA Confidential ) came up trumps again with this Oscar-nominated comedy drama. College professor Michael Douglas is having writer's block on his follow-up to his acclaimed first novel, his affair with married chancellor Frances McDormand has resulted in her pregnancy and student Katie Holmes, boarding at his home, is getting a crush on him... Douglas, playing the cardigan-clad shaggy professor bemused at what life has thrown at him is superb and the supporting cast of Tobey Maguire, Robert Downey Jnr and Rip Torn all add to this genuine gem of a movie(n)

programme.title: Freedom Writers
programme.desc: Assigned the thankless task of teaching freshman English at a gang-infested Long Beach, CA high school, a 23-year-old teacher resorts to unconventional means of breaking through to her hardened students in director Richard LaGravenese's adaptation of Erin Gruwell's best-seller The Freedom Writer's Diaries: How a Teacher and 150 Teens Used Writing to Change Themselves and the World Around Them. Her students had been written off, and her chances of succeeding scoffed at, but Erin Gruwell (Hilary Swank) wasn't about to go down without a fight. Long Beach is a place where a new war is waged with each passing day, and when the hardened students who walk those dangerous hallways sense an outsider attempting to understand their plight, their cynical resentment threatens to keep a deadly cycle in motion. Despite the initially hostile reaction she receives in the classroom, Gruwell uses the writings of Anne Frank and Zlata's Diary: A Child's Life in Sarajevo to teach her students not only the basis of the English language, but compassion and tolerance as well. Later, when the time comes to tell their own tales in a project specially designed to explore the daily violence that the majority of students have grown numb to, the barriers that had once stood so strong gradually begin to crumble. When the only chance for survival is to befriend the person who was once your mortal enemy, the world is opened to a whole new realm of possibilities(n)

programme.title: Bloodsport
programme.desc: An American soldier becomes involved in an illegal Hong Kong kickboxing competition, where combatants fight to the death for the world championship. This extremely violent, low-budget action drama was reportedly based on the true story of martial arts champ Frank Dux(n)

programme.title: Skinwalkers
programme.desc: Rival werewolves battle for a half-blood boy. One group wants to end the curse, but the other already has the taste for blood(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: World-weary criminal profiler Alex Cross is challenged to a nasty game when a senator's daughter is kidnapped. Cross is still bruised from his last assignment, but he needs his wits about him... this case is not as it seems. A polished thriller(n)

programme.title: The Stanford Prison Experiment
programme.desc: Docudrama about a 1971 psychological experiment in which 24 male undergrads at Stanford were asked to role-play as guards and inmates in a mock prison setting(n)

programme.title: The Manchurian Candidate
programme.desc: Director Jonathan Demme and star Denzel Washington team together for the first time since 1993's critically acclaimed Philadelphia in this remake of the 1962 political thriller The Manchurian Candidate, which was based on the novel of the same name by Richard Condon and featured Frank Sinatra in the lead role. Washington plays Bennett Marco, a soldier who, along with Raymond Shaw (Liev Schreiber) and the rest of their platoon, is kidnapped by the enemy during the first Gulf War. Back home years later, as Shaw rises to political prominence, Marco begins to remember that they had been brainwashed by their captors, programmed to carry out the wishes of terrorists when triggered by a specific phrase. The Manchurian Candidate also stars Meryl Streep, Miguel Ferrer, and Jon Voight(n)

programme.title: Pulp Fiction
programme.desc: Two hitmen investigate a cocaine deal that went wrong, a boxer ordered to take a fall ponders the double-cross, while a mobster's girl takes an overdose after a night dancing. Multiple tales of LA's gangland underworld, interlinked with stunning confidence and backed by a supercool surf soundtrack. One of the most influential movies of the 90s(n)

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: World-weary criminal profiler Alex Cross is challenged to a nasty game when a senator's daughter is kidnapped. Cross is still bruised from his last assignment, but he needs his wits about him... this case is not as it seems. A polished thriller(n)

programme.title: The Day
programme.desc: A small band of friends make an uneasy alliance with a mysterious lone wolf in this blend of horror and adventure. An unnamed catastrophe has turned the Earth into a wasteland, and as packs of feral cannibals wander the countryside, a dwindling number of survivors struggle to stay alive. Rick (Dominic Monaghan), Adam (Shawn Ashmore), Henson (Cory Hardrict), and Shannon (Shannyn Sossamon) have been journeying together for months and are the last living members of a much larger group. Mary (Ashley Bell) is a solitary woman who crossed paths with the survivors and is now traveling with them. She isn't interested in discussing her past or becoming friends, but the others learn she's a powerful ally in a fight. The travelers take shelter in a house, but are soon surrounded by cannibals; they quickly realize just how strong a warrior Mary can be, while also discovering the terrible truth that led her to wander alone. The Day was directed by Douglas Aarniokoski, who has accumulated extensive credits as an assistant director and helming second-unit material on major films

programme.title: Compound Fracture
programme.desc: A fractured family fights back against the vengeful wraith that's determined to kill them all, and trap their souls for all eternity. Upon learning his aging father's mental health has taken a turn for the worse, Michael Wolffsen (Tyler Mane) packs up the car, and hits the road with his nephew and fiancé in tow. His heavily fortified country home surrounded by acres of land, Michael's father Gary (Muse Watson) has been dabbling in the occult, and his new wife Annabelle is about to walk out on him. Meanwhile, Michael is convinced that his father is suffering from aggressive dementia, and seeks out a facility where he can be treated. Just when it appears that this family has a handle on their problems, however, a malevolent spirit (Derek Mears) appears determined to imprison their souls, and curse them for generations. Now, with their entire bloodline in danger, this family must fight to avoid a fate worse than death

programme.title: Snowpiercer
programme.desc: A revolution brews on a train containing the last of humanity in this sci-fi film set during a new ice age. When the lower classes in the back cars decide to invade the upper classes in the front, the superpowered locomotive speeds toward tragedy

programme.title: Lost Christmas
programme.desc: A series of tragic events that blight a young boy's life are reversed one Christmas Eve, giving him and those around him the happy ending that they were destined to have

programme.title: Space Warriors
programme.desc: A group of bright youths attending space camp use their knowledge of science and astrophysics to help rescue three astronauts who are stranded on the International Space Station following an unexpected crisis

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: Skinny seventh-grader Spencer spends recess avoiding class-bully Turbo. But when Spencer dons an android cyborsuit that crashed in a meteor, Turbo will be no trouble. Spencer then learns he must defeat the outer-space arachnid, Broodwarrior

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: A modern-day marine biologist (Josh Hartnett) slips into a coma, taking him on an epic journey through time while exploring his undying love for a woman that spanned four centuries. As he fights for his life on a hospital bed, his journey through the First Anglo-Maratha War becomes interwoven through passion and love

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: This sci-fi thriller finds the world in imminent danger when a collision in outer space sends huge pieces of interstellar debris on a path headed straight for Earth. A scientist has designed a system that would stop the largest meteor fragments from striking the earth, but a fanatical religious cult have made it their business to stop him. A convicted murderer (Ice-T) with ties to the group must now join forces with an FBI agent (Suzy Amis) to free the scientist from the cult's clutches and prevent millions of needless deaths. Mario Van Peebles and Linden Ashby appear in supporting roles

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Scientists perform paranormal experiments on a woman, and strive to weaponize the evil within her. But the otherworldly power proves stronger than anyone anticipated, prompting a shocking series of events that the government tried to cover up

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Young Jamie is killed by a drag-racing gang led by Packard Walsh because he was caught romancing Keri, Packard's girlfriend. Suddenly a mysterious power creates Jake Kesey, a cool motor-biker who looks much like Jamie. Around the same time a black turbo racing car makes an appearance in the town. Packard's gang begin to suffer from a number of unfortunate "accidents"

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A Russian Special Forces soldier must escape from a mysterious island where people are harvested for their organs and continue on her quest to rescue her sister

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: A group of campers hunker down in a medieval Turkish town and play a mysterious party game that quickly escalates into something far more sinister(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A London orphan named Molly Moon studies hypnosis, and uses her powers to escape from her orphanage and search for a friend who was adopted. However, she is soon distracted by the thought of becoming a movie star via mesmerism, as well as by a thief who wants her help with a heist(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: In this haunting thriller, a supernatural being torments a family one year after the death of their daughter(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a reclusive wizard team up to defend the Celtic people from an invasion by the Saxons in this epic adventure(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf runs away after his parents are slaughtered, and ends up in a colony of lycanthropes(n)

programme.title: Blood and Sand
programme.desc: Previously filmed in 1922 with Rudolph Valentino and in 1940 with Tyrone Power, Vicente Blasco Ibanez's mystical bullfight novel Blood & Sand was given a third big-screen treatment in 1989. Though filmed in Spain by a Spanish director, the 1989 Blood & Sand casts American actor Christopher Rydell as the bullfighter hero. Also hailing from the USA is a pre-Basic Instinct Sharon Stone, playing the vamp role previously essayed in 1922 by Nita Naldi and in 1940 by Rita Hayworth. The story remains the same: a dirt-poor youth rises to fame and fortune in the bull ring, forgets his roots, cheats on his wife, has a last-minute change of heart, and pays for his sins in grotesque fashion(n)

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Wrestling superstar "Stone Cold" Steve Austin packs a wallop in this action-packed adventure. He plays Jack Conrad, a convicted murderer who's purchased from a Central American prison and sent to battle nine other killers in a made-for-TV death match that is being broadcast as part of a reality-television extravaganza. Former European soccer star Vinnie Jones costars as McStarley, a sociopathic former Special Forces operative. Directed by Scott Wiper, who co-wrote the script(n)

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: In this Italian melodrama, three Roman prostitutes suddenly find themselves on the streets when the city informs them that their brothel is to be destroyed. The story chronicles what happens to each of them(n)

programme.title: The Last Survivors
programme.desc: Though not officially acknowleged at the time of its telecast, the made-for-TV movie The Last Survivors was a rehash of the 1957 theatrical feature Abandon Ship; both in fact were based on the same true story. A typhoon at sea has sunk a ship, leaving Alexander Holmes (Martin Sheen) as the highest ranking officer to survive. Commandeering a crowded lifeboat, Holmes must face the fact that the tiny vessel is in danger of floundering itself--and there's another typhoon on the way. Thus is Holmes forced to "play God", decided who among the passengers will allowed to remain in the lifeboat, and who will be cast overboard. Broadcast by NBC, The Last Survivors debuted on March 4, 1975. ~Saw Film/TV Guide/Marrill/Internet/Expert(n)

programme.title: Wolves
programme.desc: A teenage werewolf runs away after his parents are slaughtered, and ends up in a colony of lycanthropes(n)

programme.title: Heartless
programme.desc: A young photographer with a huge, red heart-shaped birthmark on his face learns that reptilian monsters are posing as street gangs in London. Their leader offers to remove his facial disfigurement in return for performing some evil deeds(n)

programme.title: Cockneys vs Zombies
programme.desc: Two Cockney siblings lead the residents of a quiet retirement community in a bloody war against the undead in this horror comedy from director Matthias Hoene. Andy (Harry Treadaway) and Terry (Rasmus Hardiker) were in the middle of robbing a bank to save the rest home where their grandfather lives when the zombie apocalypse struck East London. After arriving at the nursing home heavily armed and with cash in tow, the two brothers prepare to fight their way out with the assistance of some trigger-happy seniors. Michelle Ryan and Honor Blackman co-star

programme.title: SXSW Comedy With W. Kamau Bell
programme.desc: W. Kamua Bell hosts as some of the hottest comics take the stage at the SXSW festival. Appearing: Todd Glass; Wyatt Cenac; Iliza Shlesinger; Rachel Feinstein; Nate Bargatze; Matt Braunger; Mark Normand; Beth Stelling; Joe DeRosa; and Jon Huck

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: In this comedy, a middle-aged man juggles his problems with women, literature, and a career, while a younger man chases the artifact of his dreams. Pittsburgh college professor Grady Tripp (Michael Douglas) is currently single following his divorce from his third wife; after publishing an acclaimed first novel, Grady has been working on a follow-up, but he's been sidelined by a severe case of writer's block. Grady has more than his writing career to think about; his affair with one of the (married) chancellors at the University of Pittsburgh (Frances McDormand), has resulted in her pregnancy, while Hannah (Katie Holmes), a student boarding at Grady's house, has developed a crush on him. While Grady is obsessed with his book, one of his students (Tobey Maguire) has an obsession of his own: finding a jacket once owned by Marilyn Monroe. Based on the novel by Michael Chabon, The Wonder Boys also features Robert Downey Jr., Rip Torn, and Richard Thomas

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: A research scientist, his girlfriend and his teenage daughter fight for their lives in the African desert after incurring the wrath of ruthless arms dealers

programme.title: After
programme.desc: Two bus-crash survivors awaken in an empty town and flee from an encroaching darkness

programme.title: Nightlight
programme.desc: Teens playing a spooky flashlight game in the woods at night get more than they bargained for when a demon is awakened by their shenanigans

programme.title: Passion of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore stars in this unusual psychological drama about two women caught between reality and imagination. Marie (Moore) is an American widow trying to raise two children under difficult circumstances in a small town in France. Marty (also played by Moore) is a successful businesswoman in New York City who wants to leave her busy life and lead a quieter existence in Europe. But Marty is just a product of Marie's imagination -- or at least that's what Marie thinks. Marty, on the other hand, is convinced that Marie is just someone she dreamed up. Who is right? Or are both of them wrong? And where does it leave the men in their lives (Stellan Skarsgard and William Fichtner)? Passion of Mind was the first English-language film from French director Alain Berliner, best known for the arthouse success Ma Vie en Rose

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Cheech and Chong; Dane Cook. Cheech and Chong; Dane Cook

programme.title: Inside Money
programme.desc: Topic: mutual-fund newsletters. Rick Dupuis is the program host

programme.title: Sleeping With Other People
programme.desc: After losing their virginity together at university, Lainey and Jake meet again years later at a support group for sex addicts. They vow to remain platonic friends, but the depth of their relationship makes them reconsider their bed-hopping lifestyle

programme.title: The Dramatics
programme.desc: When an actress lands a sexually explicit role, her unhappy boyfriend must either accept it or risk losing her in this romantic comedy loosely based on a true story

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A young blogger chronicles her misadventures in life and love on a popular Web site

programme.title: Jamie Marks Is Dead
programme.desc: The ghost of a young loner haunts a high school track star who discovered his dead body in this unnerving supernatural thriller. Later, the popular athlete flees his troubled home, and has a terrifying encounter with a malevolent spirit whose motivations appear to be much darker

programme.desc: Rival werewolves battle for a half-blood boy. One group wants to end the curse, but the other already has the taste for blood(n)

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: After accidentally killing a club owner in a fight, ex-Navy seal Bobby Kalinowsky must fight for his life when the dead man's gangster brother puts a price on his head. Action(n)

programme.title: Heatstroke
programme.desc: A research scientist, his girlfriend, and his teenage daughter fight for their lives in the African desert after incurring the wrath of ruthless arms dealers. When the father is brutally murdered, his girlfriend and daughter wage a harrowing struggle for survival(n)

programme.title: Passion of Mind
programme.desc: Demi Moore sinks her teeth into dual roles in this romantic fantasy. She plays Marty, a successful but stressed-out New York career woman. In her dreams, she's transported to Southern France, where she is Marie, living a kinder, gentler bohemian life. Stellan Skarsgard, William Fichtner, Sinead Cusack, Peter Rigert(n)

programme.title: Hit Me
programme.desc: A suicidal man (Christian Svensson) whose wife left him and took their child wants to cancel the hit he purchased on himself. Morocco Omari. Directed by Steven Minor(n)

programme.title: Frequencies
programme.desc: In a fantastical alternate universe, only people with the same innate frequency can be together. Despite this, a young man falls for a woman with a different frequency, and must defy the very rules of reality for his love(n)

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together(n)

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Chris Rock. Chris Rock is the guest(n)

programme.title: Fido
programme.desc: In a 1950s-era alternate universe where domesticated zombies play a functional role in society by delivering the milk, carrying the mail, and even helping out with household chores, one boy is about to find out just how big of a personal responsibility "pet" ownership truly is. When the Earth passed through a cloud of space dust and the dead arose from their graves to devour the flesh of the living, it first seemed that all hope for humanity was lost. Society's rapid slide into chaos, however, was soon halted when scientists at a company called ZomCom created a special collar that turned the rampaging animated corpses docile. Now, thanks to ZomCom, everything is under control -- or is it? Timmy Robinson (K'Sun Ray) isn't quite convinced. Quiet and withdrawn, the skeptical young boy spends so much time locked away in his room that he's almost become invisible around the household. His mother Helen (Carrie-Anne Moss) has recently purchased a zombie to help keep things tidy around the house though, and when the creature attempts to engage the curious youngster in a game of catch, a friendship is forged between boy and zombie that finds the amiable gut-muncher nicknamed Fido (Billy Connolly) practically becoming a part of the family. Things take a turn for the worse however, when Fido's collar malfunctions and Timmy's neighbors begin dying in droves. When ZomCom's top zombie control specialist Mr. Bottoms (Henry Czerny) moves in across the street from Timmy, the increasingly complicated situation threatens to place a serious stumbling block in the path of human-zombie relations(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Girls
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a group of men who get together for a high-school reunion in snowy New England. During the course of the weekend they chew over life, sports and women before one of them takes the plunge and gets married(n)

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A teenage boy (Evan Peters) and a young prostitute (Juno Temple) take a road trip up the California coast to photograph lighthouses. However, her abusive pimp could cause the journey to end in violence in this gritty drama from writer/director Tony Aloupis(n)

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: Bill Murray stars in Sofia Coppola's Oscar-winning romantic comedy-drama as over-the-hill actor Bob Harris, who is lured to Tokyo to 'act' in a whisky commercial in return for big money. In the hotel bar he bumps into Charlotte who has been left to her own devices while her husband, a successful photographer, is on an assignment. Two strangers in an unfamiliar city, they form a friendship that slips into tenderness as they recognise each other's vulnerability. By turn comic and touching, the duo turn in pitch-perfect performances(n)

programme.desc: Comedian Margaret Cho performs a stand-up routine at the Gramercy Theatre in New York City. Her set includes tributes to Robin Williams and Joan Rivers

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: In this entertaining horror comedy, a demonic lumberjack terrorizes the staff of a church camp as they prepare for spring break

programme.title: Up Close & Personal
programme.desc: A story about a career television journalist who eclipses her mentor, this drama's plot resembles that of A Star Is Born, and it shares the same screenwriters as those who penned the 1976 version of that film, John Gregory Dunne and Joan Didion. It's based loosely on the real-life story of newscaster Jessica Savitch. Sally Atwater (Michelle Pfieffer) gets a job at a Miami TV station based on a demo tape from her hometown of Reno, Nevada. The station's news director is Warren Justice (Robert Redford), a former high-profile Washington newsman whose career has suffered from his insistence on integrity. He makes Sally his gofer and criticizes her clothes and appearance while she begs him for a chance to go on-air. She becomes the station's weathercaster and Warren gives her the stage name of Tally. With Warren's constant advice, she breaks into news reporting and her star rises quickly as the two become romantically involved. She takes a better job in Philadelphia, with Warren's blessing, and there she soon eclipses the anchorwoman Marcia McGrath (Stockard Channing). From there, Tally's career continues to flourish, while her relationship with Warren takes some strange twists and turns

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: A banished warrior and a hermit wizard must team up to battle a powerful druid in an effort to save the Celt people in the dark ages of Britain

programme.title: Jersey Girl
programme.desc: This comedic drama from cult director Kevin Smith marks the filmmaker's first movie to not feature Jay, Silent Bob, and the other characters of the universe created in his first five films. Ben Affleck stars as Ollie Trinke, a fast-talking music promoter, who finds his life turned upside down when he is faced with the pleasures and pitfalls of marriage and fatherhood after falling in love with Gertrude Steiney (Jennifer Lopez). Set in 1996, the film is loosely based on Smith's own experiences as a father. George Carlin, Jason Biggs, and Liv Tyler also star

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A high-powered executive and her boyfriend go on a weekend camping trip in the Canadian wilderness. Unfortunately, the couple get lost during a hike, and end up being hunted by a vicious black bear

programme.title: Wonder Boys
programme.desc: In this comedy, a middle-aged man juggles his problems with women, literature, and a career, while a younger man chases the artifact of his dreams. Pittsburgh college professor Grady Tripp (Michael Douglas) is currently single following his divorce from his third wife; after publishing an acclaimed first novel, Grady has been working on a follow-up, but he's been sidelined by a severe case of writer's block. Grady has more than his writing career to think about; his affair with one of the (married) chancellors at the University of Pittsburgh (Frances McDormand), has resulted in her pregnancy, while Hannah (Katie Holmes), a student boarding at Grady's house, has developed a crush on him. While Grady is obsessed with his book, one of his students (Tobey Maguire) has an obsession of his own: finding a jacket once owned by Marilyn Monroe. Based on the novel by Michael Chabon, The Wonder Boys also features Robert Downey Jr., Rip Torn, and Richard Thomas

programme.title: In a Perfect World
programme.desc: An exploration of the effects of single-parents households through a profile of various men who were raised by single mothers

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Samuel L Jackson plays the eponymous hero in John Singleton's tough thriller, an ex-cop who sets out to nail Christian Bale, a killer using his rich kid connections to escape conviction. But as Shaft's net draws tighter, he has to contend with killers employed by a desperate Bale

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: Adam and Lawrence have been chained up in a filthy bathroom with a corpse lying between them. They are the latest victims of 'Jigsaw', a madman who's twisted games always leave the players dead... or worse. Horror

programme.title: Saw II
programme.desc: Darren Lynn Bousman takes the helm for this sequel, with The Jigsaw Killer inviting capture by cop Eric Mathews. But once in custody, he reveals his latest puzzle; eight people, including Mathews' son Daniel are trapped in a derelict house. If they can solve the clues, overcome the murderous traps and work together, they may be able to escape. If not, the deadly nerve gas that's in the air will kill them in just two hours

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A high-powered executive and her boyfriend go on a weekend camping trip in the Canadian wilderness. Unfortunately, the couple get lost during a hike, and end up being hunted by a vicious black bear

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: In this relentless and innovative horror film, a 19-year-old woman contracts a sexually transmitted curse after a one-night stand with a handsome stranger. Terrorized by malevolent phantoms, she turns to her friends to find a way out of this nightmare(n)

programme.title: Brad Williams: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Comedian Brad Williams delivers a stand-up set that tackles race and political correctness, as well as how his father raised him to deal with adversity(n)

programme.title: Tooken
programme.desc: Spoof of the "Taken" franchise. An ex-CIA agent who is now a mall- security guard discovers that things are being taken from him. He must team up with his mom, also an ex-CIA agent, to defeat his rival and save his family. Donnie Wahlberg, Jenny McCarthy, Ethan Suplee Co-star(n)

programme.title: American Loser
programme.desc: An aimless slacker runs out of options when he gets kicked out of his home, but he soon moves in with a woman whom he met at a support group for people with relationship problems. Eventually, she inspires him to get his life together(n)

programme.title: Inside Comedy
programme.desc: Mel Brooks; Carl Reiner. Guests include Mel Brooks and Carl Reiner(n)

programme.title: Sneakers
programme.desc: The government blackmails the leader of a high-tech security group into finding a decoder, and will drop criminal charges against him if he is successful(n)

programme.title: Calendar Girls
programme.desc: Chris (Helen Mirren) and Annie (Julie Walters) are two very different women who live in a small village in the Yorkshire Dales. Their friendship is put to the test just when their relationship needs to be stronger than ever. When Annie's husband dies of leukemia, Chris organizes a campaign to raise funds for the local hospital. Her plan is to produce a calendar featuring photographs of the village women performing their traditional tasks. But the proposal has an original twist: the women will pose in the nude. The pictures are known all across the country and the women become famous(n)

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: During the miners' strike of 1984, a group of gay activists form an unlikely union with a Welsh mining community(n)

programme.title: Spring Broke
programme.desc: The raucous history of the infamous spring break revelries in Daytona Beach, Fla., that began in the early 1960s is chronicled(n)

programme.title: Dirty Weekend
programme.desc: Neil LaBute wrote and directed this kinky comedy-drama, about two colleagues who explore their sexuality over the course of a long layover. Stuck in Albuquerque during a business trip, Les (Matthew Broderick) and Natalie (Alice Eve) decide to get out of the airport and see the sights. While Natalie considers cheating on her partner, Les investigates a drunken affair he had the last time he was in the city -- only he doesn't remember if it was with a man or a woman. Dirty Weekend made its world premiere at the 2015 Tribeca Film Festival(n)

programme.title: The DUFF
programme.desc: A teenager is devastated to learn that her classmates consider her the "designated ugly fat friend". In response, she enlists help in regaining her confidence, and plots to dethrone the school's queen bee(n)

programme.title: Black Snake Moan
programme.desc: Craig Brewer's two-handed drama begins after Rae's soldier husband is called up for duty in Iraq. She goes off the rails, sleeping around until one encounter leaves her semi-naked in the road, where she's found by Lazarus, who's nursing his own hurt of a cheating wife. Determined to save Rae from herself, he initially imprisons her in his home but, as the two form a relationship, so she begins to understand the reasons behind her actions(n)

programme.title: The Descent 2
programme.desc: The Descent editor Jon Harris makes the leap to the director's chair in this sequel to Neil Marshall's claustrophobic 2005 creature flick. Sarah Carter (Shauna MacDonald) has managed to escape from the Appalachian cave system where all of her friends were killed by "crawlers" -- primordial humanoids who have adapted to living in the subterranean darkness. In hopes that some of the spelunkers may have survived, Sheriff Redmond Vaines rounds up his deputies for a rescue mission, and decides to take Sarah along as a guide. At first Sarah has no memory of the horrors that wait below, but the further the team pushes into the cave, the more vivid her flashbacks become until the reality of the situation sinks in. Now, the rescue crew is being hunted from the shadows by a whole new clan of crawlers that are even more vicious and terrifying than their predecessors. Sarah was lucky to make it out of the caves alive the first time -- will that luck carry over into her second descent, or is she doomed to die while dreaming of escaping into the sunlight?(n)

programme.title: Hostel: Part II
programme.desc: Three American students are terrorised by psychopathic men at a Slovakian chamber of horrors in this sequel to "Hostel"(n)

programme.desc: Off-Air

programme.title: Meru

programme.title: Sneakers

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Writer and director Michael Mann updates the groundbreaking television crime series he created in the 1980s with this stylish thriller. Ricardo Tubbs (Jamie Foxx) and Sonny Crockett (Colin Farrell) are two police detectives working undercover in Florida; Tubbs is smart, cool, and resourceful, while Crockett has his own way of doing things, though he stays close enough to the rules to stay out of trouble. Their latest assignment is to get the goods on Arcangel de Jesus Montoya (Luis Tosar), a local drug kingpin whose men are believed to be responsible for a handful of recent murders. In order to infiltrate Montoya's operation, Tubbs and Crockett pose as powerboat racers willing to use their talents to pilot drug-smuggling ships for the right price. The detectives' ruse works, but as they dig deeper into Montoya's inner circle, they become involved in a dangerous operation that will take them to Haiti and Cuba, where neither the Miami Police Force nor the United States government can help them if things go wrong. Crockett also begins walking a risky path when he begins an affair with Isabella (Gong Li), a woman high up in Montoya's organization. Miami Vice marked Michael Mann's third consecutive directorial effort with Jamie Foxx after Ali and Collateral

programme.title: The Warrior's Way
programme.desc: A legendary Asian swordsman (Jang Dong-gun) must fight for his life after giving up his warrior ways and hiding out in the American badlands in this Western-martial-arts hybrid

programme.title: Meru
programme.desc: Three climbers ascend Mount Meru and endure numerous challenges while attempting to summit the Shark's Fin, a near-vertical point on the mountain

programme.desc: In this black comedy about workplace politics of the undead, cubicle dweller Evan (Fran Kranz) starts to worry about his chance for a promotion when it looks like his office has been infiltrated by vampires

programme.desc: Renny Harlin directed this suspenseful thriller about a group of FBI trainees who've gathered to study profiling techniques, only to soon discover that there is a killer among them. Val Kilmer, Christian Slater, LL Cool J, Jonny Lee Miller, Kathryn Morris, Patricia Velasquez

programme.desc: A man harboring a long-held secret returns to the church of his youth in hopes of unburdening himself, but his plan backfires. Robert Baumgardner. Written and directed by Charles Nuckolls

programme.title: G.B.F.
programme.desc: The first teen to come out of the closet at North Gateway High struggles to balance his newfound popularity with his longtime friendships as the three most-admired girls in school all attempt to claim him as their G.B.F. (gay best friend)
